p: With 69 patients per group, the trial was estimated to have 90% power at a two-sided alpha level of 0.05 based on a noninferiority margin of 10 [ 26, 27] and assuming a mean difference (MD) of 0 and a standard deviation (SD) of 20 [ 28]. Anticipating a 30% premature discontinuation or poor compliance, a total of 200 patients (100 per group) were planned to be enrolled in this trial.
